content.description: Question refers to the following maps.
content.question: Which of the following most directly contributed to the change over time depicted on the two maps?

choices.label: The construction of a national highway system
The establishment of different time zones across the country
The building of canals and roads

content.answer: The building of canals and roads

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
